contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 13, 1972 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Bowhill Institute, Bowhill, Fife, Scotland, UK FCBA website gives Cowdenbeath as winners, but report in BB of 26/2/1972 gives Tullis Russell with Cowdenbeath second, plus detail.
Open Contest Champions: Tullis Russell FCBA 'A Band' Champions:
Best section 2 band - MacTaggart Scott Works. Best section 3 band - Kelty and Blairadam. Best section 4 band - Armadale Public.
Nov. 7, 2011, 3:58 p.m. April 27, 2013, 10:54 a.m.
1 Tullis Russell Mills Duncan Campbell Triumphant Rhapsody
2 Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Enoch Jackson
3 Lochgelly Band Enoch Jackson
4 City of Edinburgh Band M. Pryce
Unknown Result Armadale Burgh Mark Brown
Unknown Result Keith and District Silver Band Tom Wright
Unknown Result Kelty & Blairadam Band David Paton
Unknown Result MacTaggart Scott Loanhead Archie Smith
Unknown Result Turriff Silver Band T. Cartwright
